name: Truffle-Infused Parmesan Crisps
description: Elevate your snacking experience with our Truffle-Infused Parmesan Crisps. Crafted from aged Parmesan cheese and delicately infused with aromatic black truffle oil, each crisp delivers a savory crunch and a luxurious burst of umami flavor. Perfect for entertaining guests, pairing with fine wines, or adding a gourmet touch to salads and soups. Gluten-free and high in protein, these artisanal crisps are both indulgent and guilt-free. Presented in a resealable 150g pouch to preserve freshness.

attributes.ingredients: Parmesan cheese, black truffle oil, sea salt
